title: One
lyrics:
[intro]
(Am) (D) (F) (G)

(Am) Is it getting better (D)
(F) Or do you feel the (G)same
(Am) Will it make it easier (D) on you
(F) Now you got someone to (G)blame

[chorus]
You say, (C) one love... (Am) one life
(F) When it's one need... (C) in the night
(C) It's one love... (Am) we get to share it
(F) It leaves you baby, if you (C) don't care for it
(Am) (D) (F) (G)

(Am) Did I disappoint (D) you?
(F) Or leave a bad taste in your (G)mouth?
(Am) You act like you never (D)had love
(F) And you want me to go with-(G)out

[chorus]
Well it's (C) too late, (Am) tonight
(F) To drag the past out in-(C)to the light
(C) We're one, but we're (Am) not the same
We get to (F) carry each other, car-(C)ry each other
O-(Am)one (D) (F) (G)

(Am) Have you come here for for-(D)giveness 
(F) Have you come to raise the (G)dead
(Am) Have you come here to play (D)Jesus
(F) To the lepers in your (G)head

[chorus]
(C) Did I ask too much, (Am) more than a lot
(F) You gave me nothing, now it's (C) all I got
(C) We're one, but we're (Am)not the same
Well, we (F) hurt each other, then we (C)do it again

[bridge]
You say, (C) love is a temple, love (Am) a higher law
Love (C) is a temple, love (Am) the higher law
You (C)ask me to enter, but (G)then you make me crawl
And (G)I can't be holdin' (F)on, to what you go-ot
(F) When all you got is (C)hurt

[chorus, straight in]
(C) One love, (Am) one blood
(F) One life, you got to (C)do what you should
(C) One life, (Am) with each other
(F) Sisters, (C) brothers
(C) One life, but we're (Am) not the same
We get to (F) carry each other, car-(C)ry each other
O-(C)o-(Am)one, O-(F)o-(C)one

[outro]
(C) Hoo-ooh-ooh-(Am)ooh, ho-oh-oh oh, (F) baby, ba-(C)by, baby
Ho-ooh ho-(C)-ho-ho (Am) 
Ho-ooh ho-(F)-ho yeah (C) yeah
Ho-ooh ho-(C)-ho-ho (Am) 
Ho-ooh ho-(F)-ho yea-(C)eah [end]
